mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_PAYMENT(PAYMENT_NO, USER_ID, PAYMENT_PHONE, PAYMENT_NAME, PAYMENT_IMP_UID, PAYMENT_MERCHANT_UID, PAYMENT_AMOUNT, PAYMENT_CATEGORY, PAYMENT_STATUS, PAYMENT_PAY_DATE, ORDER_NO) VALUES(PAYMENT_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{sessionId}, #{name}, #{phone}, #{impUid}, #{merchantUid}, #{amount}, #{category}, 'P', SYSDATE + INTERVAL '9' HOUR, #{orderNo})
mapper.update: UPDATE TBL_PAYMENT SET PAYMENT_REFUND_DATE = SYSDATE + INTERVAL '9' HOUR, PAYMENT_STATUS = 'R' WHERE PAYMENT_CATEGORY = #{category} AND ORDER_NO = #{orderNo}
